text: Luis Antonio Martínez Mateo (born 4 July 1997), sportingly known as Junior, is a Spanish-born Dominican footballer who plays as a midfielder for Segunda División B club Internacional de Madrid and the Dominican Republic national team. ==International career== Junior made his debut for Dominican Republic on 24 March 2019. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Dominican Republic footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Tercera División players Category:CD Leganés B players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Unionistas de Salamanca CF players Category:Arenas Club de Getxo footballers Category:Dominican Republic international footballers Category:Dominican Republic people of Spanish descent Category:Spanish footballers Category:Madrilenian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:Spanish people of Dominican Republic descent Category:Internacional de Madrid players
title: Junior (footballer, born 1997)
